CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
CurrentVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection in Gov Cloud
OldVersion.description: Adaptive Protection will now be available in Government clouds. Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Customers can now send survey notifications and nudges directly through Microsoft Teams. This includes survey start notifications, reminders, results rollouts, and all nudge types—ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Notifications and Nudges in Teams
OldVersion.description: Customers can now send survey notifications and nudges directly through Microsoft Teams. This includes survey start notifications, reminders, results rollouts, and all nudge types—ensuring a seamless and engaging experience for users.

CurrentVersion.title: Universal Print: Mobile print from the phone
CurrentVersion.description: Integration of Universal Print with the Microsoft 365 Copilot phone app will enable users to add work/school printers to their phones. Once the printers are installed on the phone, the user can print to them from any phone app that has a print action.

OldVersion.title: Universal Print: Mobile print on Android phones
OldVersion.description: Integration of Universal Print with the Microsoft 365 mobile app will enable users to add work/school printers to their Android phones. Once the printers are installed on the phone, the user can print to them from any phone app that has a print action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse administrators can export Pulse data
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse administrators can now search for and export a user's Pulse report, user level, and tenant-level data to a .xlsx file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse administrators can export Pulse data
OldVersion.description: Viva Pulse administrators can now search for and export a user's Pulse report, user level, and tenant-level data to a .xlsx file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Take notes with Copilot in OneNote directly in the flow from the canvas
CurrentVersion.description: Gather and create notes with Copilot in your personal non-shared OneNote notebooks directly on the page.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Take notes with Copilot in OneNote directly in the flow from the canvas
OldVersion.description: Gather and create notes with Copilot in your personal non-shared OneNote notebooks directly on the page.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer available for all M365 commercial users
OldVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will be available in Outlook for all M365 enterprise users, including Microsoft Viva users.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Multi-geo support for shared Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: This ensures data storage for shared Loop workspaces is in the correct geo. M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the group's geo, while non-M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the creator's preferred data location.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Multi-geo support for shared Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: This ensures data storage for shared Loop workspaces is in the correct geo. M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the group's geo, while non-M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the creator's preferred data location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.136 - Authorized Group Setting in Microsoft Edge for Business
CurrentVersion.description: The authorized group setting ensures that Edge respects the settings for "Printer groups," "Removable USB device groups," and "Network share groups" in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. This change will prevent users from bypassing Data Loss Prevention (DLP) protections by using Edge, thereby enhancing security and compliance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Authorized group setting in Microsoft Edge for Business
OldVersion.description: The authorized group setting ensures that Edge respects the settings for "Printer groups," "Removable USB device groups," and "Network share groups" in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. This change will prevent users from bypassing Data Loss Prevention (DLP) protections by using Edge, thereby enhancing security and compliance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections experience for Homesite customers
CurrentVersion.description: This feature sets the Home site as the default for the Viva Connections experience in Teams desktop. Once implemented, users will be able to access their organization's Home site through the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop. This change will only apply to customers who have not yet configured a Viva Connections experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections experience for Homesite customers
OldVersion.description: This feature sets the Home site as the default for the Viva Connections experience in Teams desktop. Once implemented, users will be able to access their organization's Home site through the Viva Connections app in Teams desktop. This change will only apply to customers who have not yet configured a Viva Connections experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.136 - Feature Usage Data Sync
CurrentVersion.description: Edge Sync, which enables users to synchronize their Edge user data across multiple devices, is now launching a new sync data category called Feature Usage. This new category will allow users to synchronize data regarding their utilization of Edge features across all their devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Feature usage data sync
OldVersion.description: Edge Sync, which enables users to synchronize their Edge user data across multiple devices, is now launching a new sync data category called Feature Usage. This new category will allow users to synchronize data regarding their utilization of Edge features across all their devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
OldVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for LMS integration and user sync logs for SAP SuccessFactors
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now specify and edit the user mapping in the LMS setup form. They can also view the latest user profile snapshot in Viva Learning and can also track the historic user profile changes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Custom user mapping for LMS integration and user sync logs for SAP SuccessFactors
OldVersion.description: Admins can now specify and edit the user mapping in the LMS setup form. They can also view the latest user profile snapshot in Viva Learning and can also track the historic user profile changes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for touch phones
CurrentVersion.description:
This feature allows you to configure custom contacts and speed dial on the
line key of touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. It
enables you to swiftly access frequently dialed numbers and contacts,
incorporating one-touch/press dialing and effortless management of contact
lists on touch devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speed dial customization on line keys for touch phones
OldVersion.description:
This feature allows you to configure custom contacts and speed dial on the
line key of touch phone devices certified for Microsoft Teams. It
enables you to swiftly access frequently dialed numbers and contacts,
incorporating one-touch/press dialing and effortless management of contact
lists on touch devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview capabilities for M365 Copilot
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is launching several capabilities in government cloud environments that help secure and govern data in Microsoft 365 Copilot. These are capabilities in Information Protection, Data Lifecycle Management, Audit, eDiscovery, and Communication Compliance. These capabilities will be available once Microsoft 365 Copilot is deployed.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution in Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition, transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in Teams Rooms on Android. Intelligent speaker functionalities are brought to existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams Premium in meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. This feature requires a Teams Rooms Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Speaker recognition and attribution in Teams Rooms on Android
OldVersion.description: You can now take advantage of speaker recognition, transcript attribution, and AI capabilities in Teams Rooms on Android. Intelligent speaker functionalities are brought to existing speakers via the cloud. This feature identifies and attributes people in live transcripts, utilizing a unique voice profile for each participant enabling intelligent recaps and maximum value from Microsoft 365 Copilot and Teams Premium in meetings. Users can easily and securely enroll voices via Teams Settings. This feature requires a Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Declarative Agents have already rolled out to Microsoft 365 Copilot chat, with this update we will be adding support for the same set of agents in Copilot chat in Outlook too. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat in Outlook on the Web and the new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Declarative Agents have already rolled out to Microsoft 365 Copilot chat, with this update we will be adding support for the same set of agents in Copilot chat in Outlook too. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - CSOD permissions sync in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Access permissions to learning content set in CSOD using Organizational Units are honored and reflected in Viva Learning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - CSOD permissions sync in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Access permissions to learning content set in CSOD using Organizational Units are honored and reflected in Viva Learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Reference People from your enterprise in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now reference People from your enterprise while generating content in Word.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Drafting on a selection includes being able to reference files, people, emails, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Just like when you're using Copilot to draft content on a blank line in your document, you can reference resources that provide context in addition to the content you've selected in your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Drafting on a selection includes being able to reference files, people, emails, and meetings
CurrentVersion.description: Just like when you're using Copilot to draft content on a blank line in your document, you can reference resources that provide context in addition to the content you've selected in your document.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to export an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts)  or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to export an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts)  or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Import emails from PST file to mailbox in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to import emails from .pst file to mailbox. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Import emails from PST file to mailbox in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to import emails from .pst file to mailbox. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Auto-Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to schedule an export of an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts)  or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Auto-Export mailbox to PST file in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: With this update of support for .pst files (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) in the new Outlook for Windows, users will be able to schedule an export of an entire mailbox (emails, calendars, and contacts)  or a specific mailbox folder to a .pst file. Future releases of new Outlook will expand the support for .pst file capabilities. #newoutlookforwindows #pstfilesupport.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI - Data Assessments
CurrentVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by viewing default assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview AI Hub has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI). Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Specify who can manage the screen in Town hall
CurrentVersion.description: A new option in Town hall lets organizers designate who can manage the screen during the event. Now selected individuals will be able to start the event, manage what attendees see, and end the event, ensuring a smoother and more organized event experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Unified attachment flow on Teams Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new content picker for Teams Mobile! Attach any type of content, whether files or media, from the paperclip icon in the compose overflow menu. Our unified attach flow makes it easy and intuitive to attach content from any source location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Bi-directional Calendar Syncing between Google Workspace and Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Businesses using Google Workspace for email and calendaring can now enable bidirectional synchronization with Microsoft Teams through the Teams Admin app. This enhanced sync ensures that events created in either platform are seamlessly reflected in both, improving scheduling efficiency and minimizing the risk of missed meetings. With this update, all calendar events—including incoming, outgoing, existing, and new—are fully synchronized. This feature is being rolled out gradually. When rollout is complete, you can sync up to 50,000 users per tenant.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.
